raw akas.title: Dragon Ball Super: Doragon bôru cho

akas: Dragon Ball Super: Doragon bôru cho (original title)
Dragon Ball Super New Zealand (English title)
Dragon Ball Super South Africa (English title)
akas from release info: Dragon Ball Super: Doragon bôru cho (original title)
Dragon Ball Super New Zealand (English title)
Dragon Ball Super South Africa (English title)

1.title: Heiwa no hôshû 1 oki zenî wa dare no te ni!?
1.plot: Goku works in his radish field, but wants to go training and fighting.

2.title: Yakusoku no rizôto e! Bejîta ga kazoku ryokô!?
2.plot: Vegeta, Bulma and Trunks take a family trip.

3.title: Yume no tsuzuki wa doko da!? Sûpâ Saiya-jin Goddo o sagase!
3.plot: Bills begins the search for the Super Saiyan God.

4.title: Mezase Doragonbôru! Pirafu ichimi no dai sasuken!
4.plot: The Pilaf Gang plan to get the Dragon Balls and wish for success.

5.title: Kaiô-sei no kessen! Gokû tai hakai-shin Birusu
5.plot: Goku and Beerus have a duel on King Kai's planet.

6.title: Hakai-shin o okora seru na! Dokidoki tanjô pâtî
6.plot: Beerus and Whis arrive on Earth, and take part in Bulma's birthday party. It's up to Vegeta to keep Beerus happy enough so that he won't destroy the Earth.

7.title: Yokumo ore no Buruma o! Bejîta ikari no totsuzenhen'i!?
7.plot: Bulma hits Bills for ruining her party, so he hits her back. This provokes an incredible reaction from Vegeta.

8.title: Gokû kenzanda! Birusu-Sama kara no rasuto chansu!?
8.plot: Goku arrives to Earth to appeal to Bills.

9.title: O matase, Birusu-Sama Tsuini Sûpâ Saiya-jin Goddo tanjô
9.plot: The Saiyans finally manage to form the Super Saiyan God, and the battle with Bills begins.

10.title: Misero Gokû! Sûpâ Saiya-jin Goddo no pawâ!!
10.plot: Goku goes into Super Saiyan God mode in an attempt to beat Beerus.

11.title: Tsudzukeyou ze Birusu-Sama! Kami to Kami no tatakai o!
11.plot: The battle between Goku and Beerus continues as both of them begin to fight seriously.

12.title: Uchû ga kudakeru!? Gekitotsu! Hakai-shin Tai Sûpâ Saiya-jin Goddo!
12.plot: Goku and Beerus's battle begins to create overwhelming power, causing destruction upon parts of the universe.

13.title: Gokû yo, Sûpâ Saija-jin Goddo o koete yuke!
13.plot: After a clash between blasts, the fight between Goku and Beerus continues, but something strange begins to occur to Goku's Super Saiyan God transformation.

14.title: Kore ga ora no arittake no chikarada! Ketchaku! Kami to Kami
14.plot: The fight between Goku and Beerus reaches its climactic end.

15.title: Yûsha Satan yo kiseki o okose! Uchû kara no chôsen-jô!!
15.plot: Mr. Satan receives a recognition for saving the Earth. On stage, in front of many people and TV cameras, Mr. Satan must face unexpected visitors.

16.title: Bejîta ga deshiiri!? Uisu o kôryakuse yo!
16.plot: Whis returns to Earth to snack on delicious food. Vegeta uses this as an opportunity to demand that Whis train him so that he can surpass Goku's power level.

17.title: Pan tanjô! Soshite Gokû wa shugyô no tabi e!?
17.plot: Goku discovers that Whis is training Vegeta back at Beerus's home and plans to convince Whis to train him as well.

18.title: Ora mo kita zo! Birusu-sei de shugyô kaishi da!
18.plot: Despite Chi-Chi's reluctance, Goku goes to Beerus' planet with Whis. Goku begins some unorthodox training with Vegeta and Whis. Meanwhile, a plot unfolds deep in space to resurrect Frieza.

19.title: Zetsubô futatabi! Aku no teiô: Furîza no fukkatsu!
19.plot: Son Goku and Vegeta continue training so they can fend of a surprising invader.

20.title: Jako kara no keikoku! Semari kuru Furîza to 1000-nin no heishi-tachi!
20.plot: Freeza Arrives on Earth, as part of his revenge.

21.title: Fukushû no hajimari! Furîza-gun no akui ga Gohan o utsu!
21.plot: While Freeza's forces begin their raid on Planet Earth, Goku's friends need to defend it whilst him and Vegeta are yet not aware of the danger.

22.title: Chênji! Masaka no fukkatsu! So no na wa Ginyû!!
22.plot: The crew continues their struggle against Freeza's forces until the last man standing.

23.title: Chikyû ga! Gohan ga! Zettaizetsumei! Haku kite kure Son Gokû!!
23.plot: As the Z fighters struggle against Tagoma an old foe makes a surprise return to the battlefield.

24.title: Gekitotsu! Furîza tai Son Gokû Kore ga ora no shugyô no seika da!
24.plot: After much posturing, Goku and Frieza finally begin their battle.

25.title: Zenkai batoru! Fukushû no Gôruden Furîza

26.title: Dai pinchi ni shôki ga mieta! Hangeki kaishi da Son Gokû!
26.plot: Goku finds weakness in Freeza's new form. Still, Goku finds himself in a serious trouble.

27.title: Chikyû bakuhatsu!? Ketchaku no Kamehameha
27.plot: Goku's fight with Frieza finishes and evil tyrant is defeated once again, concluding the Resurrection 'F' Saga.

28.title: Dai 6 uchû no Hakai-shin So no na wa Shanpa
28.plot: The Gods of Destruction Beerus and Champa meet. Champa proposes a match between the fighters of Universe 6 and 7.

29.title: Kakutô shiai kaisai kettei! Shushô wa Gokû yori mo tsuyoi yatsu
29.plot: The preparations for the Universe Tournament get under way.

30.title: e no o sarai Nokori futari no menbâ wa dare da!?
30.plot: Search for the remaining two members of Universe 6 team for the Martial Arts Tournament.

31.title: Zunô-Sama no moto e! Sûpâ Doragon Bôru no ari ka o kikidase!
31.plot: In attempt to collect Super Dragon Balls, Bulma and Jaco meet an interesting fellow called Zuno.

32.title: Shiai kaishi da! Min'na de "Namae no nai Hoshi"! e!
32.plot: Goku and Vegeta returns from the training. Tournament is about to begin.

33.title: Odoroke dai 6 uchû yo! Kore ga Sûpâ Saija-jin - Son Gokû da!
33.plot: The tournament finally begins, and Goku is the first to fight the mysterious fighters of Universe 6.

34.title: Pikkoro VS Furosuto Makankôsappô ni subete o kakero!
34.plot: Piccolo goes all out against Frost using his special technique, while Frost has a secret technique.

35.title: Ikari o chikara ni kaero! Bejîta no Zenkai Batoru
35.plot: Vegeta must find the strength in him to defeat the Frieza-like creature, Frost. Champa also introduces a new rule, much to the dislike of Beerus.

36.title: Masaka no dai kusen! Bejîta ikari no dai bakuhatsu!
36.plot: Champa's new rule proves to cause Vegeta a lot of difficulty, much to his distress. Vegeta must find a way to defeat this unusual foe.

37.title: Saiya-jin no hokori o wasureru na! Bejîta VS dai 6 ushû no Saiya-jin
37.plot: Vegeta squares off against Cabba in an intense battle. Vegeta goes to extreme lengths to grant a request that Cabba makes during their bout.

38.title: Dai 6 uchû saikyô no senshi! Koroshiya Hitto kenzan!!
38.plot: The mysterious assassin, Hit, from Universe 6 goes head to head with Vegeta, however, Hit has a strange move that causes Vegeta much anguish.

39.title: Seichôshita "Toki Tobashi" no hangeki!? Deru ka!? Gokû no arata na waza!
39.plot: The battle between Goku and Hit continues, however, Hit proves to be more formidable than anticipated.

40.title: Tsui ni ketchaku! Shôsha wa Birusu? Soretomo Shanpa?
40.plot: The fight between Goku and Hit finally concludes.

41.title: Ide yo Kami no Ryû Soshite negai o kanaete chonmage!
41.plot: As the winners of the Tournament Universe 7 are given the Super dragon balls and make summon the dragon for their Wish.

42.title: Haran no shukushô-kai! Tsuini taiketsu!? Monaka VS Son Gokû
42.plot: The Tournament may be over, but Goku still wants to battle Monaku to see how really strong he is. While Beerus and the rest of Dragon Ball Cast try and keep his secret hidden from Goku.

43.title: Gokû no "Ki" ga seigyofunô!? Pan no osewa de shikuhakku
43.plot: Pan is kidnapped thought to be defenseless by her captors, but as it turned out, the plan backfired.

44.title: Potofu-sei no fûin Tokihanatareta "Chôjin sui" no himitsu!
44.plot: While Monaka delivers super sweets of the Galaxy to Bulma, Trunks and Goten end up locking themselves in his truck. Finding trouble on a planet Potaufeu, Where Vegeta and Jako have to go and rescue them.

45.title: Bejîta ga kieru!? Fukusei Bejîta no kyôi!
45.plot: With Vegeta losing all of his power to the copy of himself that was made from Super strength water, it is up to Goten and Trunks to defeat him. Mean while Goku is back at full health and training at King Kai's planet.

46.title: Gokû VS fukusei Bejîta! Katsu no wa dotchi da!?
46.plot: Trunks has to go back to the main time-line to get Goku and his friends to try and save what is left of his world, as a new enemy much more powerful then anyone he has ever faced before now seeks to destroy all life on Earth.

47.title: Mirai kara no SOS! Kuroki aratana teki arawaru!!
47.plot: In the timeline of Future Trunks, a new enemy appears that requires him to return to the past and get help from the Z-Fighters.

48.title: HOPE!! Futatabi ima de mezameyo Torankusu
48.plot: Trunks is able to travel back in time, arriving on Capsule Corp.

49.title: Mirai kara no messêji Gokû burakku shûrai!
49.plot: While Goku and Vegeta continue their training along side Whis and Beerus, Future Trunks has managed to avoid death from the hands of Black and come to the present to get help.

50.title: Gokû VS Burakku! Tozasareta mirai e no michi
50.plot: Gokû Burakku has arrived in the present, and now Son Gokû will face him.

51.title: Toki o koeta omoi Torankusu to Mai
51.plot: Trunks meets young Mai and tells her of their love story.

52.title: Shitei Saikai Son Gohan to "Mirai" Torankusu
52.plot: Trunks meets Gohan, and finds the family man and scholar very different from the fighter he grew up with.

53.title: Burakku no shôtai o abake! Iza dai 10 uchû no Kaiôshin-kai e!
53.plot: Beerus and Whis take Goku to Universe 10 to find out the mystery of Black Goku. There, Goku meets the Kaio Zamasu and Gowasu.

54.title: Saiyajin no chi o hiku mono Torankusu no ketsui
54.plot: Vegeta gives Trunks brutal pep training.

55.title: Son Gokû ni atai no ne Zen'ô-Sama kara no yobidashi!
55.plot: King of All meets Goku. Time machine is finally ready and Goku, Vegeta, and Trunks are going to the future to fight Black.

56.title: Saisen Gokû Burakku! Sûpâ Saiyajin roze tôjô
56.plot: Goku and Vegeta appear in the future to fight Goku Black, but they find that he has developed a new power.

57.title: Fujimi no karada o motsu Kami Zamasu kôrin
57.plot: Zamasu's appearance during the battle between Black and Goku leads to Trunks's involvement in the fight. The battle continues in Future Trunks's time line, but has a turn for the worst because of a new power now attained by Zamasu.

58.title: Zamasu to Burakku Fukamaru futari no nazo
58.plot: Defeated, Son Goku, Vegeta and Trunks travel to the present, in order to find a way to defeat Zamasu. We also witness a developing relating to the mystery between Black and Zamasu.

59.title: Kaiôshin Gowasu o mamore Zamasu o hakai seyo!
59.plot: Goku, Beerus and Whis must save Gowasu from his treacherous apprentice.

60.title: Futatabi mirai e Akasareru Gokû Burakku no shôtai!!
60.plot: Trunks returns to the future, with Goku and his parents accompanying him. There they discover Goku Black still lives, and he explains how he defied space and time to exist.

61.title: Zamasu no yabô Katarareru kyôfu no "Ningen 0 Keikaku"
61.plot: Goku, Vegeta and Future Trunks fight Black and Zamasu in the future. Black explains his true identity.

62.title: Sekai wa ore ga mamoru! Torankusu ikari no sûpâ pawâ sakuretsu!!
62.plot: With his new found power, Trunks attempts to hold off Black and Zamasu. Meanwhile, Goku and Vegeta head back to the past to try come up with a new strategy.

63.title: Saiyajin no saibô o yogosuna! Bejîta no sôzetsu batoru kaien!!
63.plot: While Trunks recovers from his wounds, Mai embarks on a mission of her own to take out Goku Black. Having mastered the skills they needed, Goku and Vegeta return to the future with Bulma to finish the fight.

64.title: Agame yo! Tatae yo! Gattai Zamasu bakutan!!
64.plot: As the battle rages on in the future, Bulma and Trunks devise a plan to take down Zamasu, meanwhile, Vegeta shows his new-found strength while taking on Goku Black.

65.title: Saigo no shinpan ka!? Zettai Shin no kyûkyoku no pâwa
65.plot: The two zamasu fuse and become the ultimate god. Meanwhile vegeta, goku and others are stunned and try to somehow defeat the eternal god.

66.title: Kessen! Akiramenai senchi-tachi no kiseki no pawâ
66.plot: After Goku's attack shakes Zamazu's balance and reveal a weakness in him, he and Vegeta fuse together as they see hope to prevail. Nevertheless, It's Trunks's world and to him it all ultimately comes down.. .

67.title: Arata na HOPE!! O mune ni saraba Torankusu
67.plot: Zamasu makes one final almighty move to destroy the universe, but Goku brings out a forgotten but all-powerful ally to stop him.

68.title: Ide yo Shenron! Kanaeru negai wa dare no mono!?
68.plot: Goku decides to summon Shenron to honor a promise, but his friends have things they want to wish for too.

69.title: Gokû VS Arare! Hachamecha batoru de chikyû ga owaru!?
69.plot: Goku and the android girl Arale Norimaki meet after many years, in a fun-filled episode where the cast of Dr Slump and DBZ meet.

70.title: Shanpa kara no chôsen-jô! Kondo wa yakyû de shôbu da!!
70.plot: Chanpa returns, and offers a baseball game between him and Beerus.

71.title: Gokû shisu! Zettai shikkô no ansatsu irai
71.plot: Hit gets a contract to kill Goku, and prepares his assassination.

72.title: Hangeki naru ka!? Mienai koroshi no waza!!
72.plot: Goku manages to come back to life, but he seeks a fight with Hit. And who is the client who put Hit to fight Goku?

73.title: Gohan no sainan! Gurêto Saiyaman masako no eiga-ka!?
73.plot: A film of the Great Saiyaman is to be made, and Gohan is to be in it - to his chagrin, as a stuntman.

74.title: Aisuru mono no tame ni! Fukutsu no Gurêto Saiyaman!!
74.plot: Barry Kahn's attempts to sabotage Gohan get lethal when the alien parasite Watagash takes control of him.

75.title: Gokû to Kuririn Natsukashi no shugyô no ba e
75.plot: Krillin decides to train with Goku after a police battle goes bad, but can he match up to the Saiyan's level?

76.title: Kowa teki o uchiyabure! Kuririn no tôshi futatabi!
76.plot: Goku and Krillin fight against their old enemies such as Frieza and Cell in a form of nightmares in a mystical forest Master Roshi sent them to in order to fetch him a special herb.

77.title: Yarô ze Zen'o-Sama! Uchû-ichi Budôkai!!
77.plot: Goku goes and sees Zen-O to get the Tournament of Universes going.

78.title: Zen-uchû no Kami-Sama mo don hiki!? Maketara shômetsu "Chikara no taikai"
78.plot: Goku gets an invitation to the Tournament of Power, an epic tournament between universes.

79.title: Dai 9 Uchû Keri no Bajiru VS Dai 7 Uchû Majin Bû!!
79.plot: Majin Buu and Basil the Kicker continue to give Zen-Chan a show while they unravel the fight.

80.title: Nemutta tôshi o yobisamase! Son Gohan no tatakai!!
80.plot: With Majin Buu and Basil's battle concluded, Gohan is the next warrior of Universe 7 to fight. The rusty warrior's opponent is Universe 9's Lavendar. Lavender, however, has a trick up his sleeve

81.title: Tsubushi no Berugamo VS Son Gokû! Aotenjô no tsuyo-sa wa dotchi da!?
81.plot: The greatest fighters of Universes 7 and 9, Goku and Bergamo, face off.

82.title: Son Gokû yurusumaji! Seigi no Senchi Toppo ran'nyû!!
82.plot: After Goku won his battle against Bergamo, Toppo from Universe 11 challenges Goku for fight.

83.title: Dai 7 Uchû daihyô chîmu o kessei seyo! Saikyô no 10-nin wa dare da!?
83.plot: With the Zen Exhibition Match concluded and 48 hours until the Tournament of Power, Goku and Gohan search for the 10 warriors needed to complete Universe 7's team.

84.title: Sukautoman Son Gokû - Kuririn to 18-gô o izanau
84.plot: Goku and Gohan spar with Krillin to test his new techniques and his capability of being a member of the Universe 7 team.

85.title: Ugokidasu Uchû Sorezore no omowaku
85.plot: Goku searches for Majin Buu, as the Supreme Kais of each universe hold a secret meeting without Universe 7.

86.title: Hajimete majiwaru kobushi! Jinzôningen 17-gô VS Son Gokû!!
86.plot: Goku travels to an isolated wildlife preserve run by Android 17, and attempts to recruit him for the Tournament of Power.

87.title: Mitsuryô-dan o kare! Gokû to 17-gô no kyôtô!!
87.plot: Goku helps Android 17 pursue poachers from outer space.

88.title: Gohan to Pikkoro - Shitei gekitotsu no genkai shûgyô!
88.plot: In preparation for the tournament, Piccolo trains Gohan so that he may awaken the power he had long ago.

89.title: Arawareta nazo no bijo! Tenshin-ryû dôjô no kai!?
89.plot: Goku arrives at the dojo run by Tienshinhan to recruit him for the Tournament of Power.

90.title: Koerubeki kabe o misute! Gokû VS Gohan
90.plot: As Gohan fights both his father and Tien, Piccolo attacks his two enemies with a strong technique. This eventually results in the arena getting destroyed ending the match. However, Gohan requests to have a one-on-one fight against his father. Goku accepts and both fight equally, with Goku transforming into a Super Saiyan 2 and Gohan using his full power, aiming to surpass him on his own way. Eventually, Gohan makes Goku become a Super Saiyan Blue and perform his Kaio-Ken technique to have a final exchange in which Gohan is defeated. Impressed with his son's ...

91.title: Kachi nokoru no wa dono Uchû!? Zokuzoku to tsudou saikyô no Senshi-tachi!!
91.plot: The Warriors that are participating in the tournament are gathering while the tournament draws near other universes are gathering their warriors too.

92.title: Kinkyû jitai hassei! Sorowanai 10-nin no menbâ!!
92.plot: While each of the Universes prepare for the Tournament of Power in their own ways, Universe 7 gets in a pinch when they learn Majin Buu will be unable to enter the competition.

93.title: 10-jinme no Senshi wa omê da! Gokû Furiza no moto e!!
93.plot: In a desperate move to keep the roster for the Tournament, Goku decides to revive his archenemy Frieza so he can compete.

94.title: Aku no teiô fukkatsu! Demukaeru nazo no shikaku-tachi!?
94.plot: Frieza is resurrected. However, a group of assassins come for him and Goku.

95.title: Saikyô! Saiaku! Furîza ôabare!!
95.plot: Frieza goes on a rampage against the assassins sent to take him out. But if he takes too long, Universe 7 is disqualified and erased from the Tournament.

96.title: Toki wa kita! Uchû no meiun o kake mu no kai e!!
96.plot: The Tournament of Power is finally about to begin. Goku and the rest of the team head to the World of Void, site of the battle stage.

97.title: Ikinokore! Tsui ni kaimaku "Chikara no Taikai"!!
97.plot: The 80 warriors assemble in the fighting arena in the World of Void and the curtain rises on the battle for survival.

98.title: A~a mujô! Zetsubô suru Uchû!!
98.plot: The Universe 7 team is hit by a concentrated attack from the other universes.

99.title: Misetsukero! Kuririn no sokojikara!!
99.plot: The Universes get a taste of what it's like to be erased, after universe 9 is wiped out of existence, Krillin begins showcasing his newly-found powers. Universe 7 loses it's first participant.

100.title: Dai-bôsô! Mezame araburu bâsâkâ!!
100.plot: Kale unleashes her berserk Saiyan ability, but endangers her fellow teammates.

101.title: The Approaching Warrior of Justice
101.plot: The Pride Troopers of Universe 11 launch an assault on Goku's team.

102.title: The Power of Love Explodes! Universe 2's Little Witch Warriors!
102.plot: The Universe 2 lady fighters make their move.

103.title: Gohan, Show No Mercy! Showdown with Universe 10!
103.plot: Gohan goes up against Universe 10 warriors.

104.title: A Faster-Than-Light Battle Begins!
104.plot: Hit and Dispo begin to fight at the speed of light. Hit is disadvantaged when Goku comes to help.

105.title: Master Roshi's Burning Spirit
105.plot: Master Roshi takes on the fighters of Universe 4.

106.title: Death Match with an Invisible Attacker!
106.plot: An unknown sniper with incredible aim launches a stealth attack in the Tournament.

107.title: Revenge "F" The Cunning Trap?!
107.plot: Frost has to decrease the number of the Universe 7 fighters as soon as possible by order of Champa. He offers battle to Kame Sen'nin who is taking a rest.

108.title: Frieza and Frost! Conjoined Malice?!
108.plot: Frieza saves Gohan who have a hard fight with Jimeze. Then, Frost appears there, Freiza declares that he joins with Frost.

109.title: The Ultimate Enemy Approaches Goku! Now, Let Loose! The Killer Spirit Bomb!!
109.plot: Goku faces Jiren bravely using his x20 Super Saiyan Blue Kaio-ken form.

110.title: This is the Ultimate Battle of All Universes! Son Goku vs Jiren!!
110.plot: Son Goku goes against Jiren on an epic fight.

111.title: The Surreal Supreme Battle! Hit vs Jiren!!
111.plot: Hit battles Jiren after Goku has been defeated.

112.title: A Saiyan's Vow! Vegeta's Resolution!!
112.plot: Cabba is in trouble and facing elimination. Universe 6 is in disarray. Can they rally to turn it around or will they also be wiped from all existence?

113.title: With Great Joy! The Repeat Battle-Crazy Saiyan Fight!!
113.plot: Goku is on his feet again but in desperate need of a break to regain his stamina. Goku needs assistance from his team. Other warriors sense an opportunity to despatch a fatigued combatant. In steps Kale. Will she be the one to protect her fellow Saiyan?

114.title: Intimidating Passion! The Birth of a New Super Warrior!
114.plot: Kale unleashes the full power of her berserker form again. Caulifla gives words of encouragement for her to control her own power.

115.title: Goku vs Kefla! Super Saiyan Blue Defeated?!
115.plot: Super Saiyan God Goku is being pushed back by Kefla. Goku comments that he did not expect a Potara Fusion, and Kefla powers up, exclaiming that her bubbling power is out of this world and that nobody can stop her.

116.title: The Signs of a Comeback! Ultra Instinct's Huge Explosion!!
116.plot: To counter Goku's increase in power, Kefla powers up to Super Saiyan 2 and the two of them face off while Goku continues his efforts to master Ultra Instinct.

117.title: Showdown of Love! Androids vs Universe 2!!

118.title: ACCELERATING TRAGEDY: A UNIVERSE VANISHES!
118.plot: Goku and Friends face off with the remaining Universe 6 and 2 warriors.

120.title: The Perfect Survival Tactic! Universe 3's Menacing Assassins!!
120.plot: Universe 3 goes on the offensive against Universe 7. Viara confronts No. 17 and No.18. And Dr. Paparoni sends Panchia, Koitsukai, and Bollarator to attack Goku, Gohan and Vegeta.

121.title: All-Out War! The Ultimate Quadruple Merge vs Universe 7's Full Scale Attack!!
121.plot: A mini battle royale ensues as Universe seven calls in the entire team to protect their spot in the tournament of power.

122.title: For One's Own Pride! Vegeta's Challenge to Be The Strongest!!
122.plot: Vegeta has had enough of biding his time. He decides to stick his chest out and enter the fray against the seemingly unbeatable Jiren.

123.title: Body and Soul, Full Power Release! Goku and Vegeta!!
123.plot: With the tournaments final showdown on its way. Goku and co try to make their numerical advantages count over Dyspo, Toppo and Jiren. Will it be enough? Or will they each have to surpass their current limits to stand a chance?

124.title: The Fiercely Overwhelming Assault! Gohan's Last Stand!!
124.plot: Gohan and Frieza fight together against Dyspo.

125.title: With Imposing Presence! God of Destruction Toppo Descends!!
125.plot: Toppo reaches overwhelming powers in order to make sure Universe 11 wins and he will be named new God of Destruction.

126.title: Surpass Even a God! Vegeta's Desperate Blow!!
126.plot: After hurting Android 17 and Frieza with his Hakai, Toppo starts attacking Vegeta. Vegeta was unable to match Toppo's new God of destruction form but he raged himself against Toppo. In end to knock out toppo, Vegeta detonates himself.

127.title: The Approaching Wall! The Final Barrier of Hope!
127.plot: Android 17, Vegeta, Goku and Frieza maximize their struggle to defeat Jiren. Jiren releases his hidden power that surprises everyone. Android 17 shows Jiren his bravery and tries to mentally steer him into defeat. 17, protects Vegeta and Goku from a lethal attack from Jiren.

128.title: Noble Pride to the End! Vegeta Falls!!
128.plot: While Goku tries to master the Ultra Instinct, Vegeta still fights Jiren with everything he's got.

129.title: Transcending the Limit! Mastering Ultra Instinct!!
129.plot: A super heated battle for survival continues. With Jiren puttin Goku on the ropes even after he awakens ultra instict Goku surrpasses his limits once again by mastering the ultra instict.

130.title: An Unprecedented Super Showdown! The Ultimate Survival Battle!!
130.plot: The climactic battle to decide the fate of Universe 7 continues as Goku, now mastering Ultra Instinct, fights Jiren at his full power.

131.title: A Miraculous Conclusion! Farewell, Goku! Until We Meet Again!
131.plot: The Tournament of Power reaches its final climactic moment, as Goku, Frieza and 17 have to eliminate Jiren for the survival of Universe 7.

imdb.plot outline: With Majin Buu defeated half-a-year prior, peace returns to Earth, where Son Goku (now a radish farmer) and his friends now live peaceful lives. However, a new threat appears in the form of Beerus, the God of Destruction. Considered the most terrifying being in the entire universe, Beerus is eager to fight the legendary warrior seen in a prophecy foretold decades ago known as the Super Saiyan God. The series retells the events from the two Dragon Ball Z films, Battle of Gods and Resurrection 'F' before proceeding to an original story about the exploration of alternate universes.
imdb.title: Dragon Ball Super
plot: Six months after the defeat of Majin Buu, The mighty Saiyan Son Goku continues his quest on becoming stronger.

With Majin Buu defeated half-a-year prior, peace returns to Earth, where Son Goku (now a radish farmer) and his friends now live peaceful lives. However, a new threat appears in the form of Beerus, the God of Destruction. Considered the most terrifying being in the entire universe, Beerus is eager to fight the legendary warrior seen in a prophecy foretold decades ago known as the Super Saiyan God. The series retells the events from the two Dragon Ball Z films, Battle of Gods and Resurrection 'F' before proceeding to an original story about the exploration of alternate universes.::ForLand HuCy
